Paragraph.Text: This massive horizontal tunnel boring laser will cut a tunnel 5x5 meters in size. Requires huge amounts of power to operate. Does not return any useful resources.

TwoColumnParagraph.Left: Tunnel Size: Maximum Tunnel Length: Power Required: Power Capacity: Max. Power Recharge Rate: Max. Excavation Rate:
TwoColumnParagraph.Right: 5m x 5m Unlimited 1280 per meter 2560 2560 per second 0.2 meters per second
